fields.name: attributePrefix
fields.description: The prefix of JSON elements' key which is to be treated as an attribute in the XML representation

fields.name: arrayEntryTag
fields.description: The name of the XML elements that represent a converted JSON array entry

fields.name: rootTag
fields.description:
The name of the root element of the XML that will be created. If its value is (), and the converted XML
is not in the valid format, it will create a root tag as `root`

records.name: JsonOptions
records.description: Provides configurations for converting JSON to XML.

fields.name: value
fields.description: The name of the XML element

records.name: NameConfig
records.description: Defines the name of the XML element.

fields.name: prefix
fields.description: The value of the prefix of the namespace

fields.name: uri
fields.description: The value of the URI of the namespace

records.name: NamespaceConfig
records.description: Defines the namespace of the XML element

fields.name: attributePrefix
fields.description: Attribute prefix used in the XML

fields.name: preserveNamespaces
fields.description: Instructs whether to preserve the namespaces of the XML when converting

records.name: XmlOptions
records.description: Provides configurations for converting XML to JSON.

parameters.name: jsonValue
parameters.description: The JSON source to be converted to XML

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: The `xmldata:JsonOptions` record for JSON to XML conversion properties

returnParameters.description:
XML representation of the given JSON if the JSON is
successfully converted or else an `xmldata:Error`. The `()` value is not returned

functions.name: fromJson

parameters.name: xmlValue
parameters.description:
The XML source to be converted to a given target type. If the XML elements have a prefix,
the mapping field names of the record must also have the same prefix.

parameters.name: returnType
parameters.description: The `typedesc` of the returned value. this should be either `map` or `record` type

returnParameters.description:
The given target type representation of the given XML on success,
else returns an `xmldata:Error`

functions.name: fromXml
functions.description:
Converts an XML to its `Map` or `Record` representation.
Additionally, when converting to a record, XML `namespaces`, `name of elements` and `attributes` can be validated
through `xmldata:Namespace`, `xmldata:Name` and `xmldata:Attribute` annotations.

parameters.name: xmlValue
parameters.description: The XML source to be converted to JSON

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: The `xmldata:XmlOptions` record consisting of the configurations for the conversion

returnParameters.description: The JSON representation of the given XML on success, else returns an `xmldata:Error`

functions.name: toJson

parameters.name: xmlValue
parameters.description: The XML source to be converted to a Record

parameters.name: preserveNamespaces
parameters.description: Instructs whether to preserve the namespaces of the XML when converting

parameters.name: returnType
parameters.description:
The `typedesc` of the record that should be returned as a result.
The optional value fields are not allowed in the record type.

returnParameters.description:
The Record representation of the given XML on success, else returns an `xmldata:Error`
# Deprecated
This function is going away in a future release. Use `fromXml` instead.

functions.name: toRecord
descriptionSections:
# Deprecated
This function is going away in a future release. Use `fromXml` instead.

parameters.name: mapValue
parameters.description: The `Map` or `Record` representation source to be converted to XML

returnParameters.description:
XML representation of the given source if the source is
successfully converted or else an `xmldata:Error`

functions.name: toXml
functions.description:
Converts a `Map` or `Record` representation to its XML representation.
Additionally, when converting from a record, the `xmldata:Namespace`, `xmldata:Name`, and `xmldata:Attribute`
annotations can be used to add `namespaces`, `name of elements`, and `attributes` to XML representation.

annotations.name: Attribute
annotations.description:
The annotation is used to denote the field that is considered an attribute.
In the XML-record conversion, this annotation can be used to add XML attribute using the `xmldata:toXML` API and
validate the XML attribute with record fields in the `xmldata:fromXml` API.

annotations.name: Name
annotations.description:
The annotation is used to specify the new name of the existing record name or field name according to the XML format.
In the XML-record conversion, this annotation can be used to override the default XML element name using the
`xmldata:toXML` API and validate the overridden XML element name with record field using the `xmldata:fromXml` API.

annotations.name: Namespace
annotations.description:
The annotation is used to specify the namespace's prefix and URI of the XML element.
In the XML-record conversion, this annotation can be used to add XML namespace using the `xmldata:toXML` API and
validate the the XML namespace with record in the `xmldata:fromXml` API.

errors.name: Error
errors.description:
Represents the error type of the ballerina/xmldata module. This error type represents any error that can occur
during the execution of xmldata APIs.

modules.summary: >**Deprecation Notice:** This library is deprecated and will no longer be maintained or updated. Instead, it is recommended to use the [`ballerina/data.xmldata`](https://central.ballerina.io/ballerina/data.xmldata/latest) library for continued support and updates. For more information, see the new [XML to Record conversion example](https://ballerina.io/learn/by-example/xml-to-record/) and [XML to record conversion with projection example](https://ballerina.io/learn/by-example/xml-to-record-with-projection/).
modules.description:
>**Deprecation Notice:** This library is deprecated and will no longer be maintained or updated. Instead, it is recommended to use the [`ballerina/data.xmldata`](https://central.ballerina.io/ballerina/data.xmldata/latest) library for continued support and updates. For more information, see the new [XML to Record conversion example](https://ballerina.io/learn/by-example/xml-to-record/) and [XML to record conversion with projection example](https://ballerina.io/learn/by-example/xml-to-record-with-projection/).

## Overview

This module provides APIs to perform conversions between XML and JSON/Ballerina records. It provides APIs to get natural representations of data in XML from JSON and to get JSON or Ballerina records data from natural representations of data in XML.

For information on the operations, which you can perform with the `xmldata` module, see the below **Functions**.

>**Deprecation Notice:** This library is deprecated and will no longer be maintained or updated. Instead, it is recommended to use the [`ballerina/data.xmldata`](https://central.ballerina.io/ballerina/data.xmldata/latest) library for continued support and updates. For more information, see the new [XML to Record conversion example](https://ballerina.io/learn/by-example/xml-to-record/) and [XML to record conversion with projection example](https://ballerina.io/learn/by-example/xml-to-record-with-projection/).

functions.description:
Converts an XML to its `Map` or `Record` representation.
Additionally, when converting to a record, XML `namespaces`, `name of elements` and `attributes` can be validated
through `xmldata:Namespace`, `xmldata:Name` and `xmldata:Attribute` annotations.

Converts a `Map` or `Record` representation to its XML representation.
Additionally, when converting from a record, the `xmldata:Namespace`, `xmldata:Name`, and `xmldata:Attribute`
annotations can be used to add `namespaces`, `name of elements`, and `attributes` to XML representation.

records.description: Provides configurations for converting JSON to XML.
Defines the name of the XML element.
Defines the namespace of the XML element
Provides configurations for converting XML to JSON.

errors.description:
Represents the error type of the ballerina/xmldata module. This error type represents any error that can occur
during the execution of xmldata APIs.

annotations.description:
The annotation is used to denote the field that is considered an attribute.
In the XML-record conversion, this annotation can be used to add XML attribute using the `xmldata:toXML` API and
validate the XML attribute with record fields in the `xmldata:fromXml` API.

The annotation is used to specify the new name of the existing record name or field name according to the XML format.
In the XML-record conversion, this annotation can be used to override the default XML element name using the
`xmldata:toXML` API and validate the overridden XML element name with record field using the `xmldata:fromXml` API.

The annotation is used to specify the namespace's prefix and URI of the XML element.
In the XML-record conversion, this annotation can be used to add XML namespace using the `xmldata:toXML` API and
validate the the XML namespace with record in the `xmldata:fromXml` API.
